abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Balmiki Prasad
            Singh at the meeting of May 22, 2001 concerning the Country
            Assistance Strategy, Fourth Structural Adjustment Credit,
            and Interim Poverty Reduction Strategy Paper for Armenia.
